title: Grandeek
synopsis: This is a tale of swords and sorcery as the young warrior-woman Tia Allbright and her hapless assistant, Luke, battle demon assassins in a fantasy land.
voices: ['Nagai, Ichiro', 'Ebara, Masashi', 'Horie, Yui', 'Naya, Rokurou', 'Hoshi, Souichirou', 'Yamazaki, Takumi', 'Tanaka, Rie']
